EXHIBITIONS

AFRICA BLUES

Until DD-MM-YYYY

Photographer's Edoardo Delille & Giulia Piermartiri demonstrate what the Mozambique landcape may look like due to climate change. As one of the most climate-vulnerable countries, the projected landcape's show the potentially drastic changes that could occur in the not too distant future.

); } export default Exhibitions;
